remarks: Restrict the equivalence relation in a quotient structure to the base set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
qusin.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s .~ ) ) $.
qusin.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
qusin.e $e |- ( ph -> .~ e. W ) $.
qusin.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
qusin.s $e |- ( ph -> ( .~ " V ) C_ V ) $.
qusin $p |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s ( .~ i^i ( V X. V ) ) ) ) $.
